lines.text: Well, now that we're past this awkward 'getting to know you' phase, let me buy you a drink. Well, come back tomorrow - maybe we can find this photograph.
Look, Earl, I, I know this is gonna sound ridiculous but I think a strange woman's locked herself in my bathroom.
Well, Betty, how'd she get in there?

[to FBI man, to whom she previously said that nobody takes the train any more]
They took the train!
